contents.name: request_token_unable_to_create
contents.description:
The system cannot currently generate a request token.
If this issue persists, inform your account/integration manager.

contents.name: access_token_unable_to_create
contents.description:
The system cannot currently generate an access token.
If this issue persists, inform your account/integration manager.

contents.name: resource_card_details_error
contents.description:
Encountered an internal error while retrieving details of the card.
If this issue persists, inform your account/integration manager.

contents.name: resource_card_transctions_error
contents.description:
Encountered an internal error while retrieving the list of transactions of the card.
If this issue persists, inform your account/integration manager.
